page.description: Treat a character string variable as an character array, each line represents an array entry.

argument.name: string_variable
argument.description: Character variable, must be a variable passed by reference.

page.example:
dim mystringvar as c = comma_to_crlf("one,two,three")
p = *string_to_array(mystringvar) ? p.size() = 3 ? p[1] = "one" ? p[2] = "two" ? p[3] = "three"
